document_data.name: Unity of Fire
document_data.mainbody: '''Unity of Fire''' was a religious ceremony undergone by all [[firewalker]]s, the [[specialty priest]]s of [[Kossuth]], that celebrated their ability to summon a [[fire elemental]] upon reaching a certain level of skill.
document_data.Description: This ceremony was always preceded by a full day of the firewalker praying and chanting. Afterwards, they would summon a fire elemental and bestow upon them gifts in the form of food prepared by their own hands and a [[coffer]] made of some precious metal, often times [[copper]], that was full of various [[coin]]s, [[gemstone]]s, and [[jewelry]]. These were said to be carried away by the fire elemental back to the [[Crimson Pillar]], the [[divine realm]] of Kossuth.
